stories.original_headline: NASA is set to send astronauts around the Moon again
stories.original_summary: NASA is moving into a new phase of space exploration, with major progress across human spaceflight, science missions, and advanced technology. In just one year, the agency has launched multiple crewed and science missions, test-flown new aircraft, and pushed forward plans for the Moon, Mars, and bey
stories.fantasy_headline: Royal Sky Voyagers Prepare for New Lunar Journey!
stories.fantasy_story: The Royal Astrologers' Guild prepares for grand new journeys into the celestial sphere. Their brave sky voyagers will soon embark on a quest to circumnavigate the Great Silver Orb once more. With powerful new enchantments and enchanted skyships, they seek knowledge beyond the clouds, even dreaming of the Red Planet.

stories.original_headline: This small soil upgrade cut locust damage and doubled yields
stories.original_summary: Locust swarms can wipe out crops across entire regions, threatening food supplies and livelihoods. Now, scientists working with farmers in Senegal have shown that improving soil health can dramatically reduce locust damage. By enriching soil with nitrogen, crops become less appealing to the insects,
stories.fantasy_headline: Earth Wizards Discover Charm Against Blight-Bringer Swarms!
stories.fantasy_story: The dreadful blight-bringer swarms often threaten the harvests of the land. But now, the Wizards of the Earth, working with humble land tenders, have found a potent charm! By blessing the soil with vital essence, crops become less appealing to the small scourges, doubling the yield and saving livelihoods.
